authors: Jan-Henk Edens, Bennie Schutten, Raymon Boer
description:
Een client voor het uitvragen en afhandelen van anvragen richting Polybius. 
Polybius is de API voor connectivity met Exact Globe.
releaseNotes:
v1.0.20.0
    - Added remaining fields in SalesOrderVM
v1.0.19.5
    - Fix for Mandateaccount return.
    - Fix for retrieving InvoiceStatus based on InvoiceNumber
v1.0.19.4
    - Fix for retreiving bankaccounts.
v1.0.19.3
    - Added NetPrice and DiscountPercentage to SalesOrderLineVM
v1.0.19.2
    - Added bugfix for returning primitive types
v1.0.19.0
    - Added function to authorize a salesorder.
    - Fixed return type for deliver and authorize
v1.0.18.6
    - Renamed GetBankAccount to GetBankAccounts and made debitornumber optional
    - Added alias for the function for backwards compatibility
    - Added call for getting all contacts
v1.0.18.2
    - Fixed return type for GetBankAccount
v1.0.18.0
    - Added Custom Query Support
v1.0.17.1
    - Added Extended version of Company
v1.0.17.0
    - Added more reporting functionality.
v1.0.16.7
    - Added retreival of ProductionOrders
v1.0.16.6

v1.0.16.5

v1.0.16.4
     Added Gbk Mutations
v1.0.16.3
    - Added UpdateSalesOrder
v1.0.16.2

v1.0.16.0
    - Added Invoice lines for the invoice statuscall
v1.0.15.2

v1.0.14.2

v1.0.12

v1.0.11
    - Added Ledger Balance Field
